# [Interview #1112: JordanCon 6 - Cosmere questions, Entry #14](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1112#14)

#### Question

Is Harmony aware of events on Roshar?

#### Brandon Sanderson

[hesitantly] Yeeeeeeees, some of them.
